and there's a few different kinds there's the wand variety and the flock
boxes they work great I think they are too expensive and big of a purchase

Tufts on minis I don't think that's a cost that you should spend I didn't want

to find some pre-made static grass Tufts a lot of different companies make these

manage to supply and ship them to Canadian customers through Amazon for a
really good price with low shipping I don't know but I'm glad that they do
these things are really nice quality they're great because you just peel them
off the wax paper and you can stick them right down on your mini if you're
concerned about the self adhesive glue that they use not being strong enough
you can add some more PVA if you want but it's really not necessary another
neat thing is that the Tufts are fairly large relative to a miniature so I often
find myself cutting them up into smaller pieces sometimes splitting one in half
and using it on two different minis or the front and the back of the same one
so you actually get more than 100 out of a pack the downside to doing that is
that the really stretchy self-adhesive glue that's used on them when you cut
them sometimes gets a little bit screwed up but again that's where you can opt to
use some PVA for gluing it down to the base if I mean
totally honest previously I had seen this type of product before and I always
